contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=December 2007}} {{Infobox fictional country |native_name = |common_name = Pottsylvania |conventional_long_name = Pottsylvania |series = Rocky and Bullwinkle |continent = [[Europe]] |country = |event_start = |year_start = |year_end= |p1 = |flag_p1 = |image_flag = |image_coat = |national_motto = |national_anthem = ''[[Hail Pottsylvania]]'' |image_map = Map of Pottsylvania.jpg |map_caption = Location of Pottsylvania in Eastern Europe |image_map2 = |map_caption2 = |source = ''[[The Rocky and Bullwinkle Show]]'' |creator = [[Jay Ward]] |genre = [[Satirical]] [[cartoon series]] |capital = |official_languages = |ethnic_groups = |government_type = [[Military Dictatorship]] |leader_title1 = Head of State |leader_name1 = [[Mr. Big (Rocky and Bullwinkle)|Mr. Big]] (1959-61)<br>[[Fearless Leader]](1961-1964) |leader_title2 = title? |leader_name2 = |population = unknown |currency = }} '''Pottsylvania''' is a [[fictional country]] that appeared in the [[television]] series ''[[The Rocky and Bullwinkle Show|Rocky and His Friends]]'' and ''[[The Rocky and Bullwinkle Show|The Bullwinkle Show]]'', collectively referred to as ''Rocky and Bullwinkle''. Pottsylvania is a parody of a [[Cold War]]<ref>Snow, Tony: "Clinton's War Objective: To Make The World Safe for Diplomates", pg B7. St Louis Post-Dispatch, Feb 19,1998</ref><ref>[http://nl.newsbank.com/nl-search/we/Archives?p_product=CSTB&p_theme=cstb&p_action=search&p_maxdocs=200&p_topdoc=1&p_text_direct-0=0EB373AA477297BF&p_field_direct-0=document_id&p_perpage=10&p_sort=YMD_date:D&s_trackval=GooglePM] Chicago Sun Times - It's on to Pottsylvania, 1992</ref>-era eastern [[Europe]]an<ref>http://www.tvacres.com/ethnic_russian.htm Russia in US TV Shows</ref> country (possibly intended as a satire on [[East Germany]]: Pottsylvanian characters often use German words, and the [[Iron Cross]] can be seen on military aircraft). It was noted for being a nation dedicated to all matters related to [[espionage]] and deceitfulness; children were taught in schools how to commit crimes, for instance, while casual conversations would have double meanings. Populated entirely by [[government agents]] and [[saboteurs]], Pottsylvania is the one nation where the [[cold war]] never thawed. Its highest honor was the Double Cross, and its newspaper, ''The Pottsylvania Eavesdropper'', was printed in invisible ink. While many considered Pottsylvania to be a spoof, it was considered offensive by the government of the Soviet Union, which banned ''Rocky & Bullwinkle'' as anti-Soviet propaganda.<ref>[http://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?res=9500E1D91F31F933A05757C0A9669C8B63] Lidz, Frank:" SUMMER FILMS: CREATURE FEATURES; The Ongoing Adventures of Moose and Squirrel", New York Times, April 30 2000</ref> Pottsylvania's industries, besides [[espionage]], included production of a [[vehicle]] called the "[[assassination|Assassin-8]]". Millions were built despite Pottsylvania having only 12 miles of road. Natural landmarks included "Whynchatakea Peak", a large [[mountain]]. The [[geography]] of Pottsylvania is indeterminate, however. In some locations it appears to be a [[peninsula]], while in others it appears to be either a coastal nation (with [[seaports]]) or completely landlocked. Nevertheless, it is accessible by [[submarine]], which appears to be the main form of entry. [[Flora (plants)|Flora]] and [[fauna (animals)|fauna]] in Pottsylvania included the man-eating [[Venus flytrap]]-like [[plant]] known as the "Pottsylvania Creeper," and one of the world's few supplies of mooseberry bushes – mooseberries being an ingredient used (in Rocky and Bullwinkle's world) for the production of [[rocket]] [[fuel]]. The [[government]] of Pottsylvania had been headed by a uniformed [[dictator]] known only as [[Fearless Leader]]. (In some episodes, another important government figure is [[Mr. Big (Rocky and Bullwinkle)|Mr. Big]].) [[Boris Badenov]]<ref>[http://www.erie.gov/sheriff/most_wanted/boris.asp Most Wanted: Boris Bandanov<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and [[Natasha Fatale]] seemed to be Fearless Leader's most frequently used [[secret agent]]s, often sent to execute the country's schemes for gaining global power. ==[[National anthem]]== "Hail Pottsylvania" is the [[national anthem]] of Pottsylvania, which appears in ''[[The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle]]''. Lyrics: :Hail, Pottsylvania :Hail to the black and the blue! :Hail, Pottsylvania :Sneaky and crooked through and through, :Down with the good guys, up with the boss :Under the sign of the triple cross, hey! :Hail, Pottsylvania, :Hail, hail, hail! ==References == {{reflist}} {{RockyAndBullwinkle}} [[Category:Fictional European countries]] [[Category:The Rocky and Bullwinkle Show]]
